Name: Clear the Alchemist's Garden
Description: The Alchemist requests you to clear his garden of rodents and bring 3 rat tails as proof of the deed. You will receive a healing potion and 10 gold pieces.

Name: Clear the Farmer's Field
Description: The old farmer requests you to clear his field of venomous snakes and bring him back 3 Cobra Fangs. You will be rewarded with an adventurer's pass that will allow you to cross the bridge.

Name: Slay the Giant Spider
Description: The Giant Spider has terrorized your town for too long. Trade routes with neighbouring cities has been disrupted as a result of the Spider taking over the forest. Bring back a piece of his silk as proof of the deed. You will receive 50 gold and a Broad Sword as reward.
